# isotracer: An R package to model tracer flows in networks

## Quick install

Installing from the GitLab repository should be as easy as typing:

```
# Run inside an R session
install.packages("devtools")
library(devtools)
install_github("stan-dev/rstantools", quiet = TRUE)
install_gitlab("matthieu-bruneaux/isotracer", quiet = TRUE)
```

It's a good idea to have a look at the
[tutorials](articles/tutorial-000-index.html) to get an idea of how things
work!

*(The steps above will install the latest stable release. To install the latest development release, check [this link](https://matthieu-bruneaux.gitlab.io/isotracer/develop).)*
